mapper.select:
select count(g.id) from t_mall_group_buy g where g.is_delete = 0
and g.g_start_time > now() and g.g_end_time > now()
and g.g_start_time <= now() and now() < g.g_end_time
and g.g_start_time < now() and g.g_end_time <= now()
and g.shop_id in
#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and g.shop_id = #{shoplist[0]}

select gb.g_start_time,gb.g_end_time,gb.product_id from t_mall_group_buy gb where gb.is_delete = 0 and gb.is_use = 1
and gb.product_id in
#{item,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and ((gb.g_start_time <= now() and now() < gb.g_end_time) or (gb.g_start_time > now() and gb.g_end_time > now()))

select ms.s_start_time,ms.s_end_time,ms.product_id from t_mall_seckill ms where ms.is_delete = 0 and ms.is_use = 1
and ms.product_id in
#{item,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and ((ms.s_start_time <= now() and now() < ms.s_end_time) or (ms.s_start_time > now() and ms.s_end_time > now()))

#{item,jdbcType=INTEGER}

#{item,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select b.id, b.product_id as productId, b.g_name as gName, b.g_price as gPrice, b.g_start_time as gStartTime, b.g_end_time as gEndTime, b.g_people_num as gPeopleNum, b.g_max_buy_num as gMaxBuyNum, b.shop_id as shopId, c.image_url as imageUrl,e.specifica_img_url as specImageUrl,p.is_specifica as isSpecifica,p.pro_name as proName ,if(p.is_specifica = 0 ,p.pro_price,d.inv_price) as proPrice,p.pro_stock_total as proStockTotal from t_mall_group_buy b left join t_mall_product p on b.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT ass_id,image_url from t_mall_image_associative WHERE ass_type=1 AND is_delete=0 AND is_main_images=1) c ON b.product_id=c.ass_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_id,specifica_img_id,inv_num,inv_price,id FROM t_mall_product_inventory where is_default=1 AND is_delete=0)d ON b.product_id=d.product_id LEFT JOIN t_mall_product_specifica e ON d.specifica_img_id=e.id where b.id = #{id}

SELECT
from t_mall_group_buy g left join t_mall_group_join j on g.id = j.group_buy_id and j.join_type = 1 WHERE g.is_delete = 0 and g.is_use =1 and g.id = #{id} group by g.id

select gb.id as groupBuyId ,j.id as id,gb.is_use from t_mall_group_buy gb right join t_mall_group_join j on j.group_buy_id = gb.id left join t_mall_order o on o.id = j.order_id where (gb.g_start_time < now() and gb.g_end_time <= now() or gb.is_use = -1) and o.order_status = 2 and j.join_type = 1 and j.join_status != -1 and (select count(j2.id) as count from t_mall_group_join j2 where j2.id = j.id or j2.p_join_id = j.id) < gb.g_people_num

SELECT COUNT(gb.`product_id`) as count,gb.`product_id` from t_mall_group_buy gb WHERE gb.is_delete=0 and gb.is_use=1 AND ((gb.g_start_time <= NOW() AND NOW() < gb.g_end_time) OR (gb.g_start_time > NOW() AND gb.g_end_time > NOW()))
and gb.product_id in
#{item,jdbcType=INTEGER}
GROUP BY gb.`product_id`
